content:
Toya Devasya is a hot springs resort located in Toya Bungkah, Bali, near the base of Mount Batur. Here are some things to do in Toya Devasya:

1. Soak in the hot springs - The main attraction of Toya Devasya is its hot springs, which are believed to have healing properties. There are several hot spring pools at the resort, ranging from warm to hot temperatures, and some offer views of the surrounding mountains and Lake Batur.
2. Enjoy a massage - Toya Devasya also offers spa services, including traditional Balinese massages, which can be a great way to relax and unwind after a long hike.
3. Try the local cuisine - Toya Devasya has a restaurant that serves traditional Balinese cuisine, including dishes made with locally-sourced ingredients. Be sure to try the sate lilit, a type of Balinese satay made with minced fish and spices.
4. Take a walk around Lake Batur - Toya Devasya is located on the shores of Lake Batur, which is the largest lake in Bali. Take a stroll along the lake shore and enjoy the scenic views of the mountains and the water.
5. Visit the nearby hot springs - There are several other hot springs located in the area around Toya Devasya, including the popular Toya Bungkah hot springs. Consider taking a day trip to explore the other hot springs in the area.
